languages.text: Благодаря влиянию Лорд-капитана Идира и Вигдис попробовали залатать разошедшуюся по швам дружбу. Однако, надев зловещее ксеноустройство, Идира вновь отдалилась от подруги — с каждым днем ей было все труднее испытывать что-либо кроме потребности в слепом служении. Вигдис избегала общества Идиры, видя, что от ее подруги остается лишь пустая оболочка.
languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идиры пси-удушитель надет добровольно

languages.text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.
languages.original_text: Благодаря влиянию Лорд-капитана Идира и Вигдис попробовали залатать разошедшуюся по швам дружбу. Однако, надев зловещее ксеноустройство, Идира вновь отдалилась от подруги — с каждым днем ей было все труднее испытывать что-либо кроме потребности в слепом служении. Вигдис избегала общества Идиры, видя, что от ее подруги остается лишь пустая оболочка.

With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

languages.text: 在领主舰长的影响下，伊迪拉和维格迪斯试图修复她们破裂的友谊。然而，自从伊迪拉戴上邪恶的异形装置后，她就再度变得疏远。随着时间流逝，伊迪拉几乎再也感觉不到任何感情，心中只有对服务的盲目渴望。在目睹了伊迪拉是如何一点点变成一具空壳之后，维格迪斯选择刻意避开了她。
languages.original_text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

traits.locale_text: 在领主舰长的影响下，伊迪拉和维格迪斯试图修复她们破裂的友谊。然而，自从伊迪拉戴上邪恶的异形装置后，她就再度变得疏远。随着时间流逝，伊迪拉几乎再也感觉不到任何感情，心中只有对服务的盲目渴望。在目睹了伊迪拉是如何一点点变成一具空壳之后，维格迪斯选择刻意避开了她。

languages.text: Unter dem Einfluss des Lord Captains versuchten Idira und Vigdis ihre zerstörte Freundschaft zu kitten. Da Idira jedoch das finstere Xeno-Gerät trug, wurde sie wieder zunehmend distanzierter. Die Tage vergingen und es fiel ihr immer schwerer und schwerer, etwas anderes zu empfinden als das Verlangen, blind zu dienen. Vigdis mied sie, weil sie sah, wie ihre Freundin sich in einen Schatten ihres früheren Ichs verwandelte.
languages.original_text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

traits.locale_text: Unter dem Einfluss des Lord Captains versuchten Idira und Vigdis ihre zerstörte Freundschaft zu kitten. Da Idira jedoch das finstere Xeno-Gerät trug, wurde sie wieder zunehmend distanzierter. Die Tage vergingen und es fiel ihr immer schwerer und schwerer, etwas anderes zu empfinden als das Verlangen, blind zu dienen. Vigdis mied sie, weil sie sah, wie ihre Freundin sich in einen Schatten ihres früheren Ichs verwandelte.

languages.text: Encouragées par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, Idira et Vigdis tentèrent de se réconcilier. Cependant, lorsqu'Idira s'équipa du sinistre appareil xénos, elle prit à nouveau ses distances. Au fil du temps, il lui fut de plus en plus difficile d'entendre quoi que ce soit d'autre que l'appel du service. Vigdis décida alors d'éviter son amie qui n'était plus que l'ombre d'elle-même.
languages.original_text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

traits.locale_text: Encouragées par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, Idira et Vigdis tentèrent de se réconcilier. Cependant, lorsqu’Idira s'équipa du sinistre appareil xénos, elle prit à nouveau ses distances. Au fil du temps, il lui fut de plus en plus difficile d'entendre quoi que ce soit d'autre que l'appel du service. Vigdis décida alors d'éviter son amie qui n’était plus que l’ombre d’elle-même.

languages.text: Con la influencia de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Idira y Vigdis trataron de arreglar su amistad dañada. Sin embargo, el siniestro dispositivo xenos de Idira hizo que volviera a distanciarse. Con el paso de los días le era cada vez más difícil sentir algo que no fuera el deseo de servir ciegamente. Vigdis la evitaba, consciente de que su amiga se estaba convirtiendo en una sombra de sí misma.
languages.original_text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

traits.locale_text: Con la influencia de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Idira y Vigdis trataron de arreglar su amistad dañada. Sin embargo, el siniestro dispositivo xenos de Idira hizo que volviera a distanciarse. Con el paso de los días le era cada vez más difícil sentir algo que no fuera el deseo de servir ciegamente. Vigdis la evitaba, consciente de que su amiga se estaba convirtiendo en una sombra de sí misma.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの影響を受け、イディラとヴィグディスは断絶した友情を修復しようとした。しかし不吉なゼノデバイスを身につけたイディラは、再び距離を置くようになった。日が経つにつれ、彼女は盲目的な奉仕への欲求以外の何かを感じることが難しくなっていた。ヴィグディスは友人が以前の姿から虚ろな存在に変わりつつあるのを見て、彼女を避けるようになった。
languages.original_text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの影響を受け、イディラとヴィグディスは断絶した友情を修復しようとした。しかし不吉なゼノデバイスを身につけたイディラは、再び距離を置くようになった。日が経つにつれ、彼女は盲目的な奉仕への欲求以外の何かを感じることが難しくなっていた。ヴィグディスは友人が以前の姿から虚ろな存在に変わりつつあるのを見て、彼女を避けるようになった。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın etkisiyle İdira ve Vigdis, bozulmuş arkadaşlıklarını onarmaya çalıştı. Ancak İdira, uğursuz zeno cihazını kuşandıktan sonra yeniden mesafeli birine dönüştü. Körlemesine hizmet etme arzusu dışında bir şey hissetmek, gün geçtikçe onun için daha da zor bir hâl aldı. Dostunun eski hâlinden bu kadar uzak, ruhsuz bir varlığa dönüştüğünü gören Vigdis, onunla etkileşime girmekten kaçındı.
languages.original_text: With the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis tried to mend their sundered friendship. Yet, after donning the sinister xenodevice, Idira became distant again. As the days passed, it became harder and harder for her to feel anything but the desire for blind service. Vigdis avoided her, seeing how her friend was turning into a husk of her former self.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın etkisiyle İdira ve Vigdis, bozulmuş arkadaşlıklarını onarmaya çalıştılar. Ancak İdira uğursuz zeno cihazını kuşandıktan sonra yeniden mesafeli birine dönüştü. Körlemesine hizmet etme arzusu dışında bir şey hissetmek, günler geçtikçe onun için giderek daha zor bir hâl aldı. Dostunun eski hâlinden bu kadar uzak, ruhsuz bir şeye dönüştüğünü gören Vigdis, onunla etkileşime girmekten kaçındı.

languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идиры пси-удушитель надет добровольно
